comments.text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #673795 comment 17 +++

Currently we schedule the new idle GC only if we have allocated new GC chunks from the OS or when we have some empty chunks set aside. With changes from the bug 673795 and bug 671702 this heuristic may not be relevant and we should investigate its replacement.
